Package CCDD

Class CcddTableTypeHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddTableTypeHandler
public class CcddTableTypeHandler extends Object
CFS Command and Data Dictionary table type handler class. The table definition consists of one or more table types, each with its associated column name(s) and file definition(s), and the value required status of the columns

    • createReplaceTypeDefinition

      protected CcddTableTypeHandler.TypeDefinition createReplaceTypeDefinition(String typeName, String description, Object[][] typeData)
      Create a new table type definition and add it to the list of type definitions. If the definition exists then replace it with the new one
      Parameters:
      typeName - Table type name
      description - Table type description
      typeData - Array of table type data
      Returns:
      Reference to the type definition created

    • addRemoveTypeDefinition

      protected CcddTableTypeHandler.TypeDefinition addRemoveTypeDefinition(String eTypeName, String nTypeName, String description, Object[][] typeData)
      Remove an existing table type (if it is found) Add a new table type
      Parameters:
      eTypeName - The name of the existing table type. If it is found it will be removed
      nTypeName - The name of the new table type. If this is null the table will not be created
      description - The description for the new table type
      typeData - Array of table type data
      Returns:
      Reference to the type definition created

    • addTypeDefinition

      protected CcddTableTypeHandler.TypeDefinition addTypeDefinition(String nTypeName, String description, Object[][] typeData)
      Add a new table type
      Parameters:
      nTypeName - The name of the new table type. If this is null the table will not be created
      description - The description for the new table type
      typeData - Array of table type data
      Returns:
      Reference to the type definition created

      Remove an existing table type (if it is found) Add a new table type
      Parameters:
      eTypeName - The name of the existing table type. If it is found it will be removed from the list

    • getTableTypeNames

      protected String[] getTableTypeNames()
      Get an array of the name of the defined table types
      Returns:
      Array of names of the table types, sorted alphabetically; an empty list if no table types are defined

    • convertVisibleToDatabase

      protected String convertVisibleToDatabase(String columnName, String inputTypeName, boolean isStructure)
      Convert the visible column name to its database equivalent by replacing all characters that are invalid in a database column name with underscores. If the column belongs to a table representing a structure the specific input types use predefined names in place of the conversion name. If the column name matches a PostgreSQL reserved word then the name is bounded by double quotes
      Parameters:
      columnName - Column name (as seen by the user)
      inputTypeName - Column input type name
      isStructure - True if the column belongs to a structure
      Returns:
      Database column name corresponding to the visible column name

    • getDefaultColumnOrder

      protected String getDefaultColumnOrder(String typeName)
      Get the default column order string
      Parameters:
      typeName - Table type name
      Returns:
      String containing the column indices separated by colons; blank if the type in invalid

    • getTypeInformation

      protected String[][] getTypeInformation()
      Get an array of the type names and descriptions, sorted by type name
      Returns:
      Array of the type names and descriptions, sorted by type name

    • getColumnNameByInputType

      protected String getColumnNameByInputType(String typeName, CcddClassesDataTable.InputType inputType)
      Get the name of the first column in the specified table type's definition that matches the specified input type
      Parameters:
      typeName - Table type name
      inputType - Column input type (InputType)
      Returns:
      Name (as seen by the user) of the first column in the specified table type's definition that matches the specified input type; null if the input type doesn't exist in the table type definition

    • getColumnNameByInputType

      protected String getColumnNameByInputType(String typeName, CcddConstants.DefaultInputType inputType)
      Get the name of the first column in the specified table type's definition that matches the specified default input type
      Parameters:
      typeName - Table type name
      inputType - Column input type (DefaultInputType)
      Returns:
      Name (as seen by the user) of the first column in the specified table type's definition that matches the specified default input type; null if the input type doesn't exist in the table type definition

    • getStructEnumColNames

      protected List<String> getStructEnumColNames(boolean useDbName)
      Get the list of unique structure table enumeration column names
      Parameters:
      useDbName - True to use the database column name; false to use the user column name
      Returns:
      List of unique structure table enumeration column names; an empty list if no enumeration columns exist

    • updateInputTypes

      protected void updateInputTypes(List<String[]> inputTypeNames)
      Update the input type for each table type definition column following a change to the input type definitions
      Parameters:
      inputTypeNames - List of the input type names, before and after the changes; null if none of the input type names changed

    • updateTableTypes

      protected void updateTableTypes(List<CcddClassesDataTable.TableTypeDefinition> tableTypeDefinitions) throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
      Check if the specified table types are new or match an existing one. If new then add the table type. If the table type name matches then compare the type definitions to ensure the two are the same (ignoring the column descriptions)
      Parameters:
      tableTypeDefinitions - List of table type definitions
      Throws:
      CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an imported data field name will cause an existing table's field to be renamed and the user elects to cancel the update

    • updateTableTypes

      protected CcddConstants.TableTypeUpdate updateTableTypes(CcddClassesDataTable.TableTypeDefinition tableTypeDefn) throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
      Check if specified table type is new or matches an existing one. If new then add the table type. If the table type name matches then compare the type definitions to see if they differ
      Parameters:
      tableTypeDefn - Table type definition
      Returns:
      TableTypeUpdate.NEW if the table type is new, TableTypeUpdate.MATCH if the table type matches an existing one, or TableTypeUpdate.MISMATCH if the table type name matches an existing one but the type definition differs
      Throws:
      CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an imported data field name will cause an existing table's field to be renamed and the user elects to cancel the update

    • buildAndExecuteUpdates

      private void buildAndExecuteUpdates(CcddClassesDataTable.TableTypeDefinition newTableTypeDefn)
      Compare the current table type data to the committed table type data and create lists of the changed values necessary to update the table definitions table in the database to match the current values
      Parameters:
      newTableTypeDefn - Table type definition
